parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: (string) Canonical unique identifier for the cluster policy.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: A page token that can be used to navigate to the next page or previous page as returned by

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

429.description: Operation is rejected due to throttling, e.g. some resource has been exhausted, per-user quota.

get.description: Returns the policy compliance status of all jobs that use a given policy. Jobs could be out of compliance if a cluster policy they use was updated after the job was last edited and its job clusters no longer comply with the updated policy.
